SEARCH
Module com.example.umleditor
Package com.example.umleditor.ui.components

Class Connection

java.lang.Object
com.example.umleditor.ui.components.Connection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Connection extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a connection (relationship) between components in a UML diagram. This class handles the rendering and management of connections between actors and use cases.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form
